### Idiom: 夏虫语冰
### Meaning: 比喻人囿于见闻，知识短浅。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: weibo
source: 从今天起，我要做一个洒脱的人，不与夏虫语冰，不与井蛙语海，道不同不相为谋罢了，外面的天地更宽广，那才是我更向往的自由～～～。
target: From today on, I want to be a carefree person, not to talk about ice with insects in summer, not to talk about the sea with frogs in the well, just because our paths are different, we can't make plans together. The outside world is broader, that's the freedom I yearn for more.

context:
### Idiom: 放冷箭
### Meaning: 乘人不备，放箭伤人。比喻暗中伤人。冷箭暗箭。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: cc-news
source: 至于当年球队小额赌注在波提斯的合约，却意外发掘出球队夺冠功臣。波提斯本季场均14.1分9.6篮板，今年角色更加吃重，随插即用的打法，有高度有活动力，能搅和禁区，也善外线放冷箭，完美融入球队的特色，让他也有机会角逐年度第六人。此外，主力控球哈勒戴更是顶起米道顿多数因伤缺阵的日子，以攻守一体的顶级控球之姿称职扮演著指挥官。
target: As for the team's small bet on Portis' contract, they unexpectedly discovered the hero of the team's championship. Portis averaged 14.1 points and 9.6 rebounds per game this season. This year, his role is even more important. He has a plug-and-play style of play. He is highly mobile and can disrupt the penalty area. He is also good at shooting cold shots from the outside. He has perfectly integrated into the team's characteristics, allowing him to also have Opportunity to compete for Sixth Man of the Year. In addition, Halladay, the main ball-handler, has withstood most of the days when Milton was absent due to injury, and he competently plays the role of commander with a top-level ball-handling attitude that combines offense and defense.

context:
### Idiom: 无往不胜
### Meaning: 无论到哪儿没有不胜利的。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: weibo
source: “告我地球同胞，敌人没有无往不胜的锋锐，并非无可战胜之神，但有我浩然军魂一息尚存，必与这些数典忘祖之辈血战到底，以安我同胞生者之心，慰我同胞死者之灵。” “我等愿身化飞灰，扬于百万星河。
target: Inform our fellow earthlings that the enemy does not have an invincible sharp edge, and is not an invincible god, but as long as our magnificent military spirit remains, we will fight to the death with these ungrateful descendants, to ease the hearts of our fellow living earthlings and comfort the spirits of our deceased compatriots. We are willing to transform into flying ashes and spread them throughout the millions of stars.

### Idiom: 三十三天
### Meaning: 佛教称欲界第六天为三十三天，即忉利天◇形容最高的地方。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: web
source: 几女齐聚。佛道三十三天。如来与那具森白骸骨。
target: Several women gather. The Buddha speaks of thirty-three heavens. Tathagata (another name for Buddha) is with that forest of white bones.

context:
### Idiom: 如人饮水，冷暖自知
### Meaning: 泛指自己经历的事，自己知道甘苦。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: web
source: 如人饮水，冷暖自知吧，大家其实现在是要盘点自己的债务情况。
target: It's like drinking water, knowing whether it's cold or hot, and now we are actually going to take stock of our debt.

context:
### Idiom: 将功赎罪
### Meaning: 拿功劳补偿过失。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: cc-news
source: 杜兰特最后1分24秒飙进三分球，把比数追成106比109，接著保罗两罚俱中，双方只差1分，接下来快艇连攻3波都没进球，却让韦斯布鲁克最后17.7秒两罚俱中，韦斯布鲁克接著更赏戴文布克火锅，更把球砸到布克脚上出界，太阳只好送艾瑞克戈登最后7.9秒两罚俱中，也让胜负底定。韦斯布鲁克虽然全场投19中3，只拿9分、8助攻与10篮板，却在最后关头靠著罚球与火锅将功赎罪，艾瑞克戈登19分，鲍威尔14分，祖巴兹12分、15篮板；杜兰特拿下26分、11助攻与9篮板的准大三元，戴文布克也拿26分，可惜两人仍然无法挽回场上颓势。
target: Durant hit a three-pointer with 1 minute and 24 seconds left in the game, bringing the score to 106-109. Paul then made both free throws, leaving the two teams just one point apart. The Clippers then missed three consecutive shots, but allowed Westbrook to make both free throws with 17.7 seconds left. Westbrook then blocked Devin Booker, and the ball bounced off Booker's foot out of bounds, forcing the Suns to send Eric Gordon to the free throw line with 7.9 seconds left, which sealed the game. Westbrook, although he only made 3 out of 19 shots and scored only 9 points, 8 assists, and 10 rebounds, redeemed himself with his free throws and block at the end of the game. Eric Gordon scored 19 points, Powell scored 14, and Zubac scored 12 points and 15 rebounds. Durant had a near-triple-double with 26 points, 11 assists, and 9 rebounds, while Booker also scored 26 points, but they were unable to turn the tide of the game.

### Idiom: 扬扬自得
### Meaning: 十分得意的样子。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: cc-news
source: 一个世代的知识分子，一路从反抗日本殖民帝国压迫，到反抗国民党的独裁统治，追求台湾民主自治的理念，是始终如一，坚持一辈子的。然而，革命烈士都被描写成盲目附从跟班、受牵连的文青，而且还扬扬自得于把‘无知’当‘清白’，还有什么比这更悲情的呢？不仅知识分子，家族描写也是。
target: A generation of intellectuals, all the way from resisting the oppression of Japanese colonial empire to opposing the dictatorship of the Kuomintang, pursues the concept of Taiwan's democratic autonomy. This pursuit is consistent and persists for a lifetime. However, revolutionary martyrs are portrayed as blindly following followers, implicated literati, and even self-satisfied in equating 'ignorance' with 'innocence'. What could be more tragic than this? Not only intellectuals, but also the portrayal of families is the same.

### Idiom: 一己之私
### Meaning: 指个人的私心、私利。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 此次检控为南韩检方史上首次提捕最大在野党党首。李在明批评是尹锡悦宣布“检察权私有化”的日子，也是法治主义因企图铲除异己的一己之私而沈沦的日子，并指出，自己依据城南市长的权限范围，依法开发地方经济，不曾谋取不正当利益。
target: This prosecution is the first time in the history of South Korean prosecutors to arrest the leader of the largest opposition party. Lee Jae-myung criticized that it was the day when Yoon Seok-yue announced the "privatization of prosecutorial power" and that it was also the day when legalism sank due to the attempt to eradicate the selfish interests of dissidents. He also pointed out that he developed the local economy in accordance with the authority of the mayor of Seongnam and never sought undue gain. Legitimate interests.

### Idiom: 转瞬之间
### Meaning: 非常短暂的一瞬间。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: web
source: 彼族虽船坚炮利，我可见景生情，以谋济勇；或更与义勇及各军联络声势，使其接应不暇，一遇有懈可击，则痛加剿洗，务夺坚巢。转瞬之间，光绪九年他便从布政使擢拔巡抚，提升之快，令人乍舌。兹于月之初二日由龙起程出关，初四日安抵谅山驻扎，消息更易相通。
target: Although their boats are powerful and their artillery is strong, I can see the scenery and their emotions, so as to help the brave; I can also contact the volunteers and the army to make them overwhelmed. If there is a vulnerability, I will attack them hard and seize the strong nest. . In the blink of an eye, in the ninth year of Guangxu's reign, he was promoted from chief envoy to governor. His promotion was astonishingly fast. On the second day of the lunar month, we set out from the customs by Long, and arrived at Lang Son and stationed on the fourth day of the lunar month, so that the news would be easier to communicate.

context:
### Idiom: 云淡风轻
### Meaning: 微风轻拂，浮云淡薄。形容天气晴好。亦作风轻云淡”。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: cc-news
source: 变化是人生的常态这个道理，其实大家都明白，‘转念’也是老生常谈了，但却很难做到。当你很努力地追求喜欢的人，却被发好人卡，还能云淡风轻地说：‘我只要在远处欣赏他就好了’吗？尽全力准备的考试或比赛结果不如人意，还可以很潇洒地说我不在乎成果吗？面对挚爱的离去，真的可以那么容易就看淡生死吗？‘人非草木，孰能无情’就连苏东坡自己本身也很难做到如此豁达，而关于他的心路历程可以参考我之前的文章〈苏东坡绝非天生豁达！黄州词三首带你看见他的迷茫与挫败〉
target: The principle that change is a constant in life is something that we all understand. The idea of 'changing one's mind' is often discussed, but it is difficult to put into practice. When you are working hard to pursue someone you like, but get friend-zoned, can you really say with a light heart: 'I am content just admiring them from afar'? When the results of an exam or competition for which you have prepared to the best of your ability are not as expected, can you still casually say that you don't care about the outcome? When faced with the departure of a loved one, can you really easily come to terms with life and death? 'People are not emotionless like plants', even Su Dongpo himself found it difficult to be so open-minded. For more on his emotional journey, you can refer to my previous article titled "Su Dongpo Was Not Naturally Open-minded! Three Poems from Huangzhou Reveal His Confusion and Defeat".

context:
### Idiom: 坐以待毙
### Meaning: 坐着等死。比喻遭遇危难而不采取积极的措施。语出三国蜀诸葛亮《后出师表》：“然不伐贼，王业亦亡，惟坐而待亡，孰与伐之。”
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 英军意图利用布列塔尼半岛为立足点入侵诺曼第和法兰西北部的想法吓坏了腓力六世，他决定在英军抵达前赢得这场战争。让也没有坐以待毙，在他因叛国罪被追捕前几天已从巴黎逃走，在南特从支持者募集了一支军队。在1341年9月底，夏尔·德·布卢瓦率领5千名法军、2千名热那亚佣兵和数量众多的布列塔尼士兵，于卢瓦尔河谷的昂热扎营。
target: The idea of the English army using the Brittany Peninsula as a foothold to invade Normandy and northern France terrified Philip VI, who decided to win the war before the English arrived. John II did not sit idle either. A few days before he was pursued for treason, he had already escaped from Paris and assembled an army from his supporters in Nantes. At the end of September 1341, Charles de Blois led 5,000 French troops, 2,000 Genoese mercenaries, and numerous Breton soldiers to encamp at Angers in the Loire Valley.

### Idiom: 斑斑点点
### Meaning: 物体的表面颜色不纯净，颜色杂乱或凹凸不平。

**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 有时是坚硬，冰冷和复杂的。有时它在脑中建造出宇宙的模型；斑斑点点的能量穿越广阔空旷的空间。有时它称呼这些斑点为“电子”和“质子”。
target: Sometimes it is hard, cold, and complex. Sometimes it builds models of the universe in the mind; speckles of energy threading across vast, empty space. Sometimes it calls these speckles "electrons" and "protons."

### Idiom: 突然袭击
### Meaning: 指军事上出其不意地攻击。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: weibo
source: 因为每次请客的人不是固定的，我也不太好和每个人说我怎么怎么样不吃喝啥的。而且每个人工作地点不一样，所以每次请客的人直接算好今天的人数就买了，都是突然袭击。我不吃喝这些主要是因为雪糕太凉了，饮料我本身就很少喝。
target: Because the person who treats each time is not fixed, it's not easy for me to tell everyone what I don't eat or drink. Moreover, everyone works in different places, so the person who treats each time just calculates the number of people for today and buys directly, it's always a surprise attack. The main reason I don't eat or drink these is because the ice cream is too cold, and I rarely drink beverages myself.

### Idiom: 一天一地
### Meaning: 满天满地。形容到处都是。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: web
source: 订口为轴对称。采用书眉交叉倒错的方法，根据人的视线一般从幅左下方朝右上移动的规律，双码书眉排在地脚，单码书眉排在天头，一天一地，左右交错，全书书眉间隔倒错，耐人寻味。以订口为轴的对称版式，外分内合，张敛有致，或造成版面、开本的扩张，或加强向心力的聚敛，有衡稳之效。
target: The symmetry is based on the symmetry of the binding. The binding is placed in the middle of the page, and the two pages are placed on the left and right, and the single page is placed in the middle. The symmetry of the bookbinding is based on the principle that the human eyes generally move from the bottom left to the top right of the page, and the bookbinding is placed in the middle of the page, and the bookbinding is placed in the middle of the page, creating a symmetrical bookbinding. The symmetry of the binding is based on the symmetry of the binding. The binding is placed in the middle of the page, and the two pages are placed on the left and right, and the single page is placed in the middle. The symmetry of the bookbinding is based on the principle that the human eyes generally move from the bottom left to the top right of the page, and the bookbinding is placed in the middle of the page, and the bookbinding is placed in the middle of the page, creating a symmetrical bookbinding.

### Idiom: 坐以待毙
### Meaning: 坐着等死。比喻遭遇危难而不采取积极的措施。语出三国蜀诸葛亮《后出师表》：“然不伐贼，王业亦亡，惟坐而待亡，孰与伐之。”
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 英军意图利用布列塔尼半岛为立足点入侵诺曼第和法兰西北部的想法吓坏了腓力六世，他决定在英军抵达前赢得这场战争。让也没有坐以待毙，在他因叛国罪被追捕前几天已从巴黎逃走，在南特从支持者募集了一支军队。在1341年9月底，夏尔·德·布卢瓦率领5千名法军、2千名热那亚佣兵和数量众多的布列塔尼士兵，于卢瓦尔河谷的昂热扎营。
target: The idea of the English using the Peninsula of Brittany as a base to invade Normans and North France frightened King Philip VI, who decided to win the war before the English arrived. Marc had also not waited for the arrival of the English, having fled from Paris days before his being captured for treason, and had gathered a army in Montet from supporters. In the end of September 1341, Charles de Blanche leading 5,000 French troops, 2,200 renowned soldiers and many Brittany men, camped in Anjou in the valley of the Loire.

### Idiom: 二人同心
### Meaning: 比喻只要两个人齐心协力，就会无往不胜

**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 创设之初，各家先出资钱一万五，各自筹措三万钱，购置书籍后余款用于购买飞云江南岸的涂田数十亩，以田租收入维持书社日常开销和添置书籍所需。“心兰”之名或取自《易传》“二人同心，其利断金；同心之言，其臭如兰”。。心兰书社也有一套完整的管理规则，其制定的管理规则计8条： 一、每日阅书，上午九点钟起，十一点钟止，下午自一点钟起，五点钟止； 二、阅书人受授归原，均须经司书报人手，不得擅自抽插，随意转给，以致遗失； 三、阅书报人不得高声吟哦，恐声浪激荡，有碍他人思潮； 四、如欲借阅之图书现正有人阅览时，须待其阅毕，不得强索； 五、所阅之书，每次但取一本，阅毕然后换阅他本； 六、阅书能用摘录工夫最易获益。
target: In the beginning, each family contributed 15,000, and each would raise 30,000, to buy books, and the remainder went to buy land at the eastern bank of the Floating River, to maintain the bookstore's daily expenses and to add books. "Sina Lan" is a name derived from the proverb "Two Men of Same Mind, they shall become a lion; two men of same mind, they shall be a lion." "Sina Lan" also had a strict management system, which included eight rules:

### Idiom: 游目骋怀
### Meaning: 游目远眺；骋怀放开胸怀，往远处想。纵目四望，开阔心胸。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 舟凡五艘，中有滊动机名约见取丸，先一小时启航。团员争先登舟者凡二十七人，是日，天气晴朗，薰风习习，仰观宇宙之大，俯瞰沧溟之远，游目骋怀，逸兴遄飞，致足乐也。岂意乐未极而悲生，景未观而祸起，忽而黑云四赽，而天地晦冥；风雨骤至，而浊浪排空。
target: There were five boats, in which there was a machine called "Yue Jian Quan," which was used to take pills. Two hours before departure, the machine was started. A total of 27 people boarded the boat ahead of time. That day, the weather was clear, with a gentle breeze blowing. Looking up at the vast universe, looking down at the boundless ocean, one could admire the scenery and feel a sense of freedom. It was indeed a joyful occasion. However, unexpected sadness arose before the joy could be fully enjoyed, and disaster struck before the scenery could be fully appreciated. Suddenly, dark clouds gathered, and the sky and the earth became dark. A heavy rainstorm came, and the waves were turbulent.

### Idiom: 老而不死
### Meaning: 本是孙子骂旧友原壤年老无德可称术的话，后亦指年老而不利于社会国家或拖累后辈。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: cc-news
source: 洛枫认为环顾香港及海外的华人地区，他的性别越界与艺术境界，无人能及，其短暂的、一瞬即逝的，成就至美。书末引用作家毛尖追忆哥哥如何影响你我：人活得太久，难免老而不死，歹戏拖棚，唯独张国荣能够从时间中获得赦免，超脱世俗的腐蚀，二十年后更显凄美。文章获授权转载，原文可见于此。
target: Lo枫认为环顾香港及海外的华人地区，他的性别越界与艺术境界，无人能及，其短暂的、一瞬即逝的，成就至美。书末引用作家毛尖追忆哥哥如何影响你我：人活得太久，难免老而不死，歹戏拖棚，唯独张国荣能够从时间中获得赦免，超脱世俗的腐蚀，二十年后更显凄美。文章获授权转载，原文可见于此。

### Idiom: 以其昏昏，使人昭昭
### Meaning: 昏昏凝，糊涂；昭昭明白。指自己还糊里糊涂，却要去教别人明白事理。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 1965年1月29日，毛泽东肯定了陈正人这种深入工人群众参加生产劳动实践的做法，并在这个报告上作了指示：“如果管理人员不到车间小组搞‘三同’，拜老师学一门至几门手艺，那就一辈子会同工人阶级处于尖锐的斗争状态中，最后也必然要被工人阶级把他们当作资产阶级打倒。不学会技术，长期当外行，管理也搞不好，以其昏昏，使人昭昭，是不行的。”1966年2月5日，正是立春后的第一天，湖北省委向中央报告了关于逐步实现农业机械化的设想，引起毛泽东的高度重视，并在这份报告上作了批示。
target: On January 29, 1965, Mao Zedong approved Chen Zhengren’s approach of participating in the work of production, and gave instructions on this report: “If the management personnel do not go to the workshop group to do ‘three same’ and learn a few skills, they will always be in a sharp conflict with the workers, and will eventually be eliminated by the workers. If they do not learn the skills, they will always be an outsider and will not be able to manage well. It is not possible to manage without the skills. ” On February 5, 1966, the day after the Spring Festival, the Hubei Provincial Committee reported to the Central Committee that it had an idea to gradually realize the mechanization of agriculture, which attracted the high attention of Mao Zedong and made instructions on this report.

### Idiom: 坐以待毙
### Meaning: 坐着等死。比喻遭遇危难而不采取积极的措施。语出三国蜀诸葛亮《后出师表》：“然不伐贼，王业亦亡，惟坐而待亡，孰与伐之。”
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 2022年1月11日，朝鲜再次宣布成功进行高超音速导弹试射，导弹以10马赫的速度飞行大约700公里。2019年，法国国防部长弗洛伦斯·帕利宣布启动高超音速滑翔载具研发项目时表示，“许多国家都拥有此类武器，（法国）不能继续坐以待毙”。当时预计首次测试工作将在2021年年底进行。
target: On January 11, 2022, North Korea announced that it had successfully conducted a high-speed missile test, and the missile flew at a speed of about 700 km at a speed of 10 Mach. In 2019, French Defense Minister Florence Parly announced the launch of a high-speed hypersonic glide vehicle development project and said, "Many countries have this kind of weapon, and we cannot sit back and watch." At that time, it was estimated that the first test would be carried out at the end of 2021.

### Idiom: 一统天下
### Meaning: ①统一全国。②比喻为某种势力或某些人所把持的局面。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: cc-news
source: 在提升了经济实力和战斗力后，1576年（天正四年）信长越过不破关，移居近江（今滋贺县）安土城，并将岐阜托付给其嫡子信忠。然而，1582年（天正十年），就在信长即将一统天下之际，他却命丧京都本能寺。不久，信忠也战死了。
target: After improving economic strength and combat power, in 1576 (the fourth year of Tensho), Nobunaga crossed the impregnable pass and moved to Azuchi Castle in Omi (now Shiga Prefecture), entrusting Gifu to his eldest son, Nobutada. However, in 1582 (the tenth year of Tensho), just as Nobunaga was about to unify the whole country, he was killed at the Honnoji Temple in Kyoto. Soon after, Nobutada also died in battle.

### Idiom: 不遑宁处
### Meaning: 遑闲暇。没有闲暇的时候。指忙于应付繁重或紧急的事情。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 蒋介石视察后，竺可桢又作《半年来浙大之改进》之报告，托陈布雷转交蒋介石。11月初，蒋介石针对报告回复竺可桢，随后军械局土地由行政院划拨浙大，竺可桢指“卅年以来火药库与大学毗邻，人心不遑宁处，今一旦解决为之大快，而浙大百年大计亦于此决定，以现有二百亩之地基办一大学亦绰绰有余矣，何必再移城外华家池哉”。1937年初，浙大又提出建设计划，申请增加临时费，虽获得蒋介石同意，但实则教育部下年度预算已经到终审，无法再修改。
target: After Chiang Kai-shek's inspection, Zhu Kezhen wrote a report on "The Improvement of Zhejiang University in the Past Half Year", and asked Chen Bulei to pass it on to Chiang Kai-shek. In early November, Chiang Kai-shek responded to Zhu Kezhen's report. Subsequently, the land of the Military Armament Bureau was allocated to Zhejiang University by the Executive Yuan. Zhu Kezhen pointed out, "For thirty years, the ammunition depot has been adjacent to the university, causing unease among the people. Now that the issue has been resolved, it is a great relief. The centennial plan of Zhejiang University is also decided here. With the existing 200 acres of land, it is more than enough to run a university. There is no need to move to Huajiachi outside the city." In early 1937, Zhejiang University proposed a construction plan and applied for additional temporary funds. Although Chiang Kai-shek agreed, the Ministry of Education's budget for the next year had already been finalized and could not be modified.

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: weibo
source: 刘安琪 没想到你是贪慕虚荣 嫌贫爱富的人 如果爱一个人是用金钱来衡量的 那样的爱情我宁愿不要 因为你根本不值得爱 更不值得去尊重 是你让我知道了 美女都是很现实的 #四喜丸子乐队#。
target: Liu Anqi, I didn't expect you to be a person who covets vanity and despises poverty while loving wealth. If love for a person is measured by money, I would rather not have such love because you are not worth loving, let alone respecting. It's you who made me realize that beautiful women are very realistic #SìxǐWánziBand#.

source: Willem(维纶)此英文名字翻译为叶雷，该名是由5个字母组成的，听来优美悦耳又大气，作为男生子英文名，第一印象是本人奔放，诱惑、笃实！Yeray在国外，认为具有从容自若、严守时刻的品格，这个名字在国外比较少见！
target: Willem (维纶) this English name translates as Yeray, which is a name of five letters, which sounds very beautiful and powerful, as a boy's English name, the first impression is a person brave, sensual and steadfast!Yeray in the foreign country is regarded as having a calm, sober and strict character, this name is very rare in the foreign country!

Mo Xiaolin is the younger brother of Hong Kong actor Mo Yan-Kang, a child actor, he has appeared in 20 to 30 films, including "The Only Child" "The Precious One" and "The Lost One" and has appeared in films with famous actors, such as New Ma, Red Dawn, and others. He is also the assistant of Hong Kong coach Zu Wen-Zhi.

source: 现任挪威君主为哈拉尔五世，是1997年1月17日接替父亲奥拉夫五世继位，法定储君为陛下唯一一个儿子哈康王储。王储承担各种公共礼仪职能，国王的妻子宋雅王后亦复如是。在国王不在国内期间，哈康王储也担任摄政王。
target: The current Norwegian King is Haakon V, who succeeded his father Olaf V on January 17, 1997. The Crown Prince holds all public functions, as well as the King's wife, Princess Sonja. When the King is absent, the Crown Prince also serves as the governor-general.
